rules_text: When Salvage Trafficker dies, create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“My poor, poor Rustwing. I don't know if I can rebuild you, but I'll certainly try.”[/i]
